Hi all:

Sorry I've been away from the list for a while; life had been calling and I
had been ignoring her for too long.  :-)

Anyway, has any kind of defacto-standard emerged for documenting a (set of)
RESTful services?  It's become clear I really need to document what I'm
building if for no other reason than to be able to keep it all straight in
my own head. So in other words, is there a generally accepted format for
descibing resources, methods, headers, and content-types they accept on
responses; representations, headers, and status codes they respond with; and
workflow interactions they perform when orchestrated?   

Thanks in advance.
